column4: The russian mafia pays people to write virusew for windows, :)
You learn about computers by using Linux.. with windows.. you learn about scanning for viruses and defragging all day long

I got a mixxed network of windows and linxu machines.. with samba shares on all of them. I cant 'see' the shares/mechines for some machines with nautilus, or windows. unless i enter the ip# of the server in question. then it works..  Whats causing this. oddity.
